CustomField.formula:
IF( Owner.Profile.Name = "CSB", IMAGE('/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01537000000JDqt',""),
IF( OR( Owner.Profile.Name = "Sales - P&C", Owner.Profile.Name = "P&C - Customer Success"), IMAGE('/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01537000000JDqj', ""),
IF( Owner.Profile.Name = "Alpharoot", IMAGE('/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01537000000JDJB', ""),
IF( Owner.Profile.Name = "BRP Partner", IMAGE('/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01537000000JDqo', ""),
"" ))))
CustomField.label: Account Flag
